heading: HB04409
0: AN ACT PROVIDING THAT PUBLIC UTILITY VEHICLE DRIVERS WHO ENCOUNTER FORTUITOUS VEHICULAR MALFUNCTIONS OR BREAKDOWNS WHILE ON DUTY SHALL BE PROVIDED WITH IMMEDIATE EMERGENCY ASSISTANCE, AND SHALL NOT BE CONSIDERED AS A TRAFFIC OFFENSE
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2019-09-11
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04409
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING THAT PUBLIC UTILITY VEHICLE DRIVERS WHO ENCOUNTER FORTUITOUS VEHICULAR MALFUNCTIONS OR BREAKDOWNS WHILE ON DUTY SHALL BE PROVIDED WITH IMMEDIATE EMERGENCY ASSISTANCE, AND SHALL NOT BE CONSIDERED AS A TRAFFIC OFFENSE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BAUTISTA, CLAUDINE DIANA D.
DATE FILED : 2019-09-05
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2019-09-11
